purpose: To provide a secure and flexible environment for executing AI agent code and workflows, enabling developers to test, run, and backtrack multi-step processes safely.
principle: The core principle of arrakis is to ensure isolation and security while allowing comprehensive customization for various AI agent applications.
reusability: Arrakis promotes reusability by allowing developers to create modular and customizable workflows that can be easily shared and adapted for different AI tasks.
limitations: As an experimental project in alpha status, arrakis may have limited stability, incomplete features, and potential security vulnerabilities that need to be addressed in future releases.
name: arrakis
description: A fully customizable and self-hosted sandboxing solution for AI agent code execution and computer use. It features out-of-the-box support for backtracking, a simple REST API and Python SDK, automatic port forwarding, and secure MicroVM isolation. Perfect for safely running, testing, and backtracking multi-step agent workflows.
